mdRecord.dcterms:title: Untitled [Mount Vernon]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: England, William, 1830-1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Mount Vernon mansion with piazza being held up with ship masts. A man and woman are seated in the foreground with another man standing in the background. Mounted on cream colored board. Handwritten note on the reverse states, 'This is a London stereoview prior to 1860.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Robert Waldsmith Collection. See also, related stereograph - http://catalog.mountvernon.org/digital/collection/p16829coll23/id/283/rec/4
